posts.post_content: ***Maro** (Also MaRo) is the nickname for longtime Magic: The Gathering card designer Mark Rosewater. The truncated version of his name is both a card and a common shorthand around the Magic playing community. "Maro" cards reference the number of cards in players' hands and grow more powerful the more there are.* From Wikipedia
posts.html:
Maro (Also MaRo) is the nickname for longtime Magic: The Gathering card designer Mark Rosewater. The truncated version of his name is both a card and a common shorthand around the Magic playing community. "Maro" cards reference the number of cards in players' hands and grow more powerful the more there are. From Wikipedia

posts.post_content:
All the artworks may look the same, but the person next to you looks into the art box and sees something completely different than you see.  
For example, I see a leafy jester waving his arms in a gyrating circle.  
You might see a face among leaves with weird sticks in his mouth. That's just an educated guess based on your performance in last years human aptitude screening. Oh, and you didn't do so well. I'd suggest you try taking supplemental vitamins.
